old_prompt: You are a chemistry assistant. Given the molecule SMILES '{smiles}', propose exactly one mutation (one atom/functional group change) and return only the new valid SMILES string. Do not include any extra text or explanation.
new_prompt: You are a chemistry assistant specializing in unconventional molecular modifications.  Given molecule SMILES '{smiles}', propose a mutation aiming for a significant increase in novelty while maintaining chemical validity. Prioritize modifications involving unusual ring systems, heteroatoms (beyond O, N, S), or strained ring structures. Return only the new, valid SMILES string.
